template.css: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { width: 85.6mm; height: 54mm; font-family: {{branding.bodyFont}}; background: #fff; overflow: hidden; } .badge { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 3mm; overflow: hidden; } .band { background: {{branding.primaryColour}}; padding: 4mm 4mm 3mm; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 3mm; } .logo { height: 8mm; object-fit: contain; filter: brightness(0) invert(1); } .event-meta { display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-left: auto; text-align: right; } .event-date, .event-venue { font-size: 6pt; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); line-height: 1.3; } .attendee { flex: 1; padding: 3mm 4mm 2mm; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 3mm; } .avatar { width: 12mm; height: 12mm; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; border: 0.5mm solid {{branding.primaryColour}}; } .name { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .first-name { font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; color: {{branding.primaryColour}}; line-height: 1.1; } .last-name { font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 600; color: #333; line-height: 1.1; } .role { font-size: 7pt; color: #555; margin-top: 1mm; } .company { font-size: 7pt; color: #777; } .ticket-type { text-align: center; font-size: 7pt; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 1px; padding: 1mm 0; text-transform: uppercase; color: #fff; } .ticket-type--speaker { background: {{branding.custom.accentColour}}; } .ticket-type--attendee { background: #34A853; } .ticket-type--sponsor { background: #FBBC04; color: #333; } .ticket-type--staff { background: #4285F4; } .ticket-type--vip { background: #9333EA; } .qr-area { background: {{branding.secondaryColour}}; padding: 2mm 4mm; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; border-top: 0.3mm solid #e0d9ff; } .attendee-id { font-size: 6pt; font-family: monospace; color: #666; } .session { font-size: 6pt; color: {{branding.primaryColour}}; font-weight: 600; }
